pleaseContactCsResetPassword: Please contact our customer service team to reset your password
passwordRules: Use at least 8 characters with a combination of letters, numbers, and symbols.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.description: We will send a link to reset your password to your registered email address.
forgotPassword.successMessage: Follow the link in the email we sent to {{email}} to reset your password.
